title: Episode 112: Kardashians, Comic-Con, and Charismatic Catholicism!
description: Phil breaks down and says the word "Kardashian," girls at Comic-Con say "no touchy!" and an account of one woman's journey from Charismatic Catholicism to atheism to...?  It's another fun week on the Phil Vischer Podcast!
